title: LuJoSoftMovieNfoCreator2014
description:
I need feedback on the new version  LuJoSoft Movie Nfo Creator. Up till now it was created for the need and uploading rules of H33T, now I want to make it universal so anything you wish to see in it just ask.

The major change in this version is I included the TV shows search from Tmdb.
I did fix lots of bugs and still looking for more that's why I need your help to find them.




Prerequisites:Note that all prerequisites will be install by the installer if needed.
Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.1.
Supported OS.
Windows Vista SP2.
Windows 7 SP1.
Windows 8.
Windows Server 2008 SP2.
Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1.
Windows Server 2012.

Sql Server Compact 4.0 sp1.


System requirement:
Hardware Requirements:
1 GHz or faster processor.
512 MB of RAM.
850 MB of available hard disk space (x86) If you have to install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.1
2 GB of available hard disk space (x64) If you have to install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.1
Minimum resolution 1024X768.


Please
I want this to be the best ever version of this program so for these reason I ask you guys:

Need help to have a better description and spelling check. Don't forget I'm french.
Need many suggestion to improve it. Again I'm alone in this project and ideals are getting lost at this point.
Are there any other utility you want me to add.
Need to know how the new installer goes. 
Any feed back will be welcome negative or positive.

[url]http://www.lujosoft.net/Forum1/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=531[/url]
